author: silviodonato
body:
This PR allows the character `'` in relvals options.
As pointed out in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34599#issuecomment-890328605 this PR is not sufficient to run `--command` because of https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/blob/master/pr_testing/test_multiple_prs.sh#L1002
title: Allow character ' in relvals options
